text: The following is a list of events affecting 2015 in Indian television. ==Television series debuts== *Aadhe Adhoore *Aaj Ki Raat Hai Zindagi *Aponjon *Ishq Ka Rang Safed *Piya Rangrezz *Rukawat Ke Liye Khed Hai ==Television series endings== * 2025 Jaane Kya Hoga Aage * Humsafars * Jai Jai Jai Bajrang Bali * Laut Aao Trisha ==Television seasons== * Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa (season 8) * MTV Love School * MTV Roadies (season 12) == See also == * :Category:2015 Indian television series debuts ==References== Category:2015 in India Category:Entertainment in India Category:Indian culture
title: 2015 in Indian television
